flowRoot.flowPara: Organic groups module manages the translation teams, hands out permissions and provides a community interface. The localization community module allows translation of strings.

All releases of all projects are scanned for translatable strings. The "bidirectional" connection allows display of translation status information on the project interface, as well as translation package downloads.

The template extractor is reused to generate a list of the transnlatable strings from specific files. Locale module provides the list of languages, and allows the community server itself to be available in all languages possible.

Due to new features we use for on-page translation, this module is only possible with Drupal 6. The connection between the server and client is still to be defined; it could be "bidirectional", or could work from the client to the server only.
Localization server and client architecture overview with Drupal.org connector
(ie. in the form of how this is planned to be deployed in connection to drupal.org)
